00025 // main system configuration
00026 require '../../../sysconfig.inc.php';
00027 // start the session
00028 require SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'admin/default/session.inc.php';
00029 
00030 // privileges checking
00031 $can_read = utility::havePrivilege('stock_take', 'r');
00032 $can_write = utility::havePrivilege('stock_take', 'w');
00033 
00034 if (!($can_read AND $can_write)) {
00035     die('<div class="errorBox">'.__('You don\'t have enough privileges to access this area!').'</div>');
00036 }
00037 
00038 // if transaction is started
00039 if (isset($_POST['itemCode'])) {
00040     echo '<html><body>';
00041     // update item data
00042     $item_code = $dbs->escape_string(trim($_POST['itemCode']));
00043     if (!$item_code) {
00044         echo '<script type="text/javascript">'."\n";
00045         echo 'parent.$(\'stError\').update(\'Please enter a valid item code/barcode. You enter a BLANK code!\');'."\n";
00046         echo 'parent.$(\'stError\').setStyle( {display: \'block\'} );'."\n";
00047         echo 'parent.$(\'itemCode\').value = \'\';'."\n";
00048         echo 'parent.Form.Element.focus(\'itemCode\');'."\n";
00049         echo '</script>';
00050         echo '</body></html>';
00051         exit();
00052     }
00053     // check item status first
00054     $item_check = $dbs->query("SELECT * FROM stock_take_item WHERE item_code='$item_code'");
00055     $item_check_d = $item_check->fetch_assoc();
00056     if ($item_check->num_rows > 0) {
00057         if ($item_check_d['status'] == 'l') {
00058             // record to log
00059             utility::writeLogs($dbs, 'staff', $_SESSION['uid'], 'stock_take', 'Stock Take ERROR : Item '.$item_check_d['title'].' ('.$item_check_d['item_code'].') is currently ON LOAN');
00060             echo '<script type="text/javascript">'."\n";
00061             echo 'parent.$(\'stError\').update(\'Item '.$item_code.' is currently ON LOAN\');'."\n";
00062             echo 'parent.$(\'stError\').setStyle( {display: \'block\'} );'."\n";
00063             echo 'parent.$(\'itemCode\').value = \'\';'."\n";
00064             echo 'parent.Form.Element.focus(\'itemCode\');'."\n";
00065             echo '</script>';
00066         } else if ($item_check_d['status'] == 'e') {
00067             echo '<script type="text/javascript">'."\n";
00068             echo 'parent.$(\'stError\').update(\'Item '.$item_code.' is already SCANNED!\');'."\n";
00069             echo 'parent.$(\'stError\').setStyle( {display: \'block\'} );'."\n";
00070             echo 'parent.$(\'itemCode\').value = \'\';'."\n";
00071             echo 'parent.Form.Element.focus(\'itemCode\');'."\n";
00072             echo '</script>';
00073         } else {
00074             $listShow = 0;
00075             if (isset($_POST['listShow']) && $_POST['listShow'] == '1') {
00076                 $listShow = 1;
00077             }
00078             // current time
00079             $curr_time = date('Y-m-d H:i:s');
00080             $update = $dbs->query("UPDATE stock_take_item SET status='e', checked_by='".$_SESSION['realname']."', last_update='".$curr_time."' WHERE item_code='$item_code'");
00081             $update = $dbs->query("UPDATE stock_take SET total_item_lost=total_item_lost-1 WHERE is_active=1");
00082             echo '<script type="text/javascript">'."\n";
00083             echo 'parent.setContent(\'mainContent\', \''.MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'stock_take/current.php?listShow='.$listShow.'\', \'get\');'."\n";
00084             echo '</script>';
00085         }
00086     } else {
00087         // record to log
00088         utility::writeLogs($dbs, 'staff', $_SESSION['uid'], 'stock_take', 'Stock Take ERROR : Item Code '.$item_code.' doesnt exists in stock take data. Invalid Item Code OR Maybe out of Stock Take range');
00089         echo '<script type="text/javascript">'."\n";
00090         echo 'parent.$(\'stError\').update(\'Item Code '.$item_code.' doesnt exists in stock take data.\\nInvalid Item Code OR Maybe out of Stock Take range\');'."\n";
00091         echo 'parent.$(\'stError\').setStyle( {display: \'block\'} );'."\n";
00092         echo 'parent.$(\'itemCode\').value = \'\';'."\n";
00093         echo 'parent.Form.Element.focus(\'itemCode\');'."\n";
00094         echo '</script>';
00095     }
00096     echo '</body></html>';
00097 }
